Material used.Description: Telomere length was measured in fibroblasts from patients with DKC1 mutations and healthy controls.

Readout description.Result Description: DKC1 mutation (c.677G>A) was associated with significantly shorter telomeres in patient fibroblasts compared to controls.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for patient and control fibroblasts.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate using quantitative fluorescence in situ hybridization (Q-FISH).

Basic positive control.Description: Healthy control fibroblasts were used as a positive control for normal telomere length.

Basic negative control.Description: No-template control was used in Q-FISH to confirm absence of nonspecific signals.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used to compare telomere lengths between groups.

Material used.Description: Cell proliferation was assessed in hematopoietic stem cells from Dkc1-mutant and wild-type mice.

Readout description.Result Description: Dkc1-mutant mice exhibited reduced hematopoietic stem cell proliferation compared to wild-type controls.

Biological replicates.Description: Five biological replicates were performed for each mouse genotype.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in duplicate using flow cytometry.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type mouse hematopoietic stem cells were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: No-cell control was used to confirm absence of nonspecific signals.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used to compare proliferation rates between groups.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell proliferation rate ≥ 1.5-fold increase in wild-type mice.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Cell proliferation rate < 1.2-fold increase in mutant mice.

Material used.Description: Apoptosis was measured in fibroblasts from patients with DKC1 mutations and healthy controls.

Readout description.Result Description: DKC1-mutant fibroblasts showed increased apoptosis compared to control fibroblasts.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for patient and control fibroblasts.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate using Annexin V/PI staining and flow cytometry.

Basic positive control.Description: Healthy control fibroblasts were used as a positive control for normal apoptosis rates.

Basic negative control.Description: No-cell control was used to confirm absence of nonspecific signals.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used to compare apoptosis rates between groups.
